name: Verify Planet Interaction and Course Setting
description: Validates that player can interact with planet, see course setting prompt, and confirm course selection.
testObjective: Ensure planet interaction and course setting mechanic functions correctly.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Planet is visible in camera view

steps.action: Navigate camera to hover over the visible planet
steps.expected: Planet becomes highlighted or shows interaction state

steps.action: Click [E] or [LMB] to interact with planet
Press [C] or click [LMB] to confirm course

steps.expected: Camera terminal automatically turns off after course confirmation

postconditions: Player can proceed to next sequence
